ing: 4 cups green (under ripe) mangoes - peeled, seeded, and diced
des: "My mom makes this chutney during the summer to serve as a garnish for fish or steak. It is great as a gift too. Scrumptious!"
ins: Place the mango, raisins, serrano peppers, garlic, ginger, lemon zest, black pepper, molasses, cinnamon, and cloves into a large saucepan. Pour in the water and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer uncovered until a jam-like consistency is attained, about 30 minutes. Stir frequently while cooking. Once thickened, cool, and store in the refrigerator. The chutney may also be frozen.
